questions.question: 'Medically speaking, hemo-, hema- & hemato- all mean this'
'Before -standard & -marine, it means below'
'Before -biography or -graph, it means self'
'It puts the fire before -technics & -mania'
'This prefix turns 1 byte of data into about a billion'

'Wild ones of these found on pizza include shiitakes, morels & chanterelles'
'Head to this state's peach festival in For Valley if you want to help make the world's largest peach cobbler'
'Any pilgrimage to find the best olives will lead you through Kalamata in this country'
'This country's Murcia & Valencia regions produce many of the world's apricots'
'76 years old, the original Hass avocado tree died in 2002 in La Habra Heights in this state'
'In 1852 cherries were planted on Old Mission Peninsula in this Midwest state; it now grows 75% of the tart type'
'The word "prawn" is used loosely for a large one of these shellfish'
'The Muppet known as Pepe the Prawn did commercials for a restaurant chain named for this "Long" character'
'Like many insects, prawns also feature pairs of these long, thin sensory organs on their heads'
'Prawns go through as many as 11 different metamorphoses during this stage of immaturity'
'From the Latin for "having a shell", it's the subphylum to which all prawns belong'

'Belonging to the place where one was born, like the "son" in a Richard Wright title'
'From Latin for "devour", it precedes "readers" to describe those with an insatiable appetite for books'
'Add a "G" to make a prominent member of the wedding into a prominent transportation structure'
'An "E" transforms your puppy into the chief magistrate in the former Republic of Genoa'
'Without an "S", it's royal rule; with an "S", it means to quit'
'Luminous brightness degenerates into loud, empty protests when "B" gets in front'
'On adding an "R", a word meaning "stop" starts meaning a ridge made by folding'

'When Achilles was sulking in his tent, it was during this war'

'To identify an illness via medical exam'

final-jeopardy.question: 'Geraldine Doyle, who in 1942 took a job at a Michigan metal factory, helped inspire the look & job of this iconic character'
